name: Memory Ghosts [Demo]
description:
"If you were in a story without meaning, would you try to give it one?"

Emerging into adulthood, (She) hardly knows what she wants in life. Starting community college, her and her best friend unexpectedly get invited to the school’s paranormal ghost club, which needs two members to stay a club. The club, in an effort to make themselves more known, decide to write a paper on an old building that’s going to be torn down in the next semester; Mariposa del Sol. Mariposa del Sol has a tragic history, and although (She)’s reluctant, (She) can’t help but feel drawn to the building, it’s history, and the club members that are digging into it’s past. But in doing so, (She) may find herself confronting her worst fears.

CW: mentions of anxiety, depression, suicide ideation, parental divorce, depictions of grief, and death of loved ones

Rating: 13+

Demo Includes:

+common route

+3 CGs

+~30 minutes of playtime

Full game will include:

+4 routes (3 main + an unlockable route)

+16 CGs

+8 endings

+~4 hours play time

+free
